summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2215 for the improvement of Riverside Avenue, from Second Avenue South to Tenth Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by attaching fire hydrants to the existing watermains under Ordinance No. 22481, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
